meanings.definition: The state or quality of being aloof or distant in manner or behavior.
meanings.sent1: Her aloofnesses made it hard for others to approach her.
meanings.sent2: His aloofnesses at the party made him seem unfriendly.
meanings.sent3: The cat's aloofnesses towards the new puppy was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The mountain peak's aloofnesses from the rest of the range was striking.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's aloofnesses in the classroom made a lasting impression on the students.

meanings.definition: The act of keeping oneself at a distance from others.
meanings.sent1: The aloofnesses of the shy student were noticeable in group activities.
meanings.sent2: Her aloofnesses during lunchtime suggested she preferred solitude.
meanings.sent3: The aloofnesses of the squirrel from the other animals was quite amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: The aloofnesses of the lone tree in the field stood out against the crowded forest.
meanings.sent5: The aloofnesses of the astronaut in space made him feel both isolated and free.
